entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
